title: Microsoft Teams for Remote Tech Employees

courseOutline.title: Microsoft Teams for Remote Tech Employees
description: This course is designed to help remote tech employees feel comfortable and confident using Microsoft Teams for daily communication, collaboration, and productivity.
It will cover the basics of Microsoft Teams as well as more advanced features such as chat, meetings, and file management.

sections.title: Overview of Microsoft Teams
sections.content: An introduction to what Microsoft Teams is and how it can be used for communication and collaboration in a remote work environment.

sections.title: Getting Started with Microsoft Teams
sections.content: A step-by-step guide on setting up an account, joining teams, and accessing channels.

sections.title: Basic Chat Functions
sections.content: How to send messages, use emojis, and format text in chat conversations.

sections.title: Advanced Chat Options
sections.content: Exploring features like @mentions, pinned messages, and private chats.

sections.title: Meeting Features
sections.content: An overview of features like screen sharing, recording, and live captions.

sections.title: Working with Shared Files
sections.content: Exploring options for editing, commenting on, and versioning shared files.

sections.title: Next Steps
sections.content: Suggestions for further learning and resources to continue improving Microsoft Teams skills.
